<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 2"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Investigator Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=1844) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
<trait label="Dedication" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=41" />
<trait label="Multiclass" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=115" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 151 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Investigator](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=41)

**Prerequisites**
Intelligence 14

</column>

---

You gain the [on the case](/Classes.aspx?ID=13) class feature, which grants you both the Pursue a Lead activity and Clue In reaction. You become trained in [Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14) and another skill of your choice. If you were already trained in Society, you instead become trained in an additional skill of your choice. You also become trained in investigator class DC.

<document level="2" id="action-544" />

<document level="2" id="action-545" />

**Special** You can't select another dedication feat until you have gained two other feats from the investigator archetype.

<title level="2">Investigator Dedication leads to...</title>
[Basic Deduction](/Feats.aspx?ID=1845), [Investigator's Stratagem](/Feats.aspx?ID=1846), [Keen Recollection](/Feats.aspx?ID=1848), [Master Spotter (Investigator)](/Feats.aspx?ID=1850), [Skill Mastery (Investigator)](/Feats.aspx?ID=1849)
name: Investigator Dedication
